Channel 2 used to measure higher pack currents, lower fidelity than channel 1
Main BMS SDC control input - allows current to be drawn from pack
Permits intermittent charging of pack - AKA Regen (Not currently used)
Charger BMS SDC control input - allows current to flow into pack

Orion's low power sleep input is configured
Orion is in "CHARGE" mode - controlled by charge power pin

Orion multi purpose output status - unused
Charge Current limit exceeded - set if violation occured with "charger safety" relay
Orion has detected a hardware failure within itself
Orion can't detect it's internal temperature
Bug in internal software led to invalid operation
An individual cell has exceeded its maximum allowable voltage
An individual cell has gone under its minimum allowable voltage
Pack temp has exceeded its max allowable value for >30s
Orion cannot communicate with its isolated cell voltage measurement hardware
At least one cell balancing circuit is not working
Orion has either detected a weak cell within the pack, or a cell that is too far out of balance
One or more cells have an extremely low cell voltage (likely dead or wiring problem) (threshold configurable)
Cell tap wire is either weakly connected or fully disconnected
BMS has detected a problem with the current sensor (check fault subcodes)
A cell in the pack has been detected to have a cell voltage over 5V
Orion has detected a communication problem with its cell voltage measurement circuitry - check fault subcode
Pack state of health estimation falls below provided threshold
Voltage on fan monitor (multi-input-3) goes outside provided threshold (if enabled)
A thermistor reading has fallen out of it expected operating range
Expected CAN messages (must be configured) have not been recieved
The BMS has lost the "always on" power supply, meaning it is no longer redundant (must be configured)
BMS has detected a breakdown in HV/LV isolation
Orion is not recieving a stable power supply between 9v and 30v
The orion pack charge curent limit was exceeded - set if violation occured with "charge enable" relay
